experience.name: Aimo
experience.summary: At Aimo, I am responsible for creating services and building interfaces for Aimo's logistics, call center, tracking, and delivery platforms. The services and optimizations I build help automate processes from order taking to delivery to customers' homes.

experience.name: Destacame
experience.summary: At Destacame, I developed various products and services for Santander Bank. I was also responsible for improving and maintaining Destacame's various projects, as well as debugging, code refactoring, and process optimization.

experience.name: Forma - Moov Media Group
experience.summary: At Forma, I was responsible for maintenance, interface construction, business logic for web platforms, and forms for companies in various industries. In addition, I helped send mass mailings using various tools.

experience.name: Minsky
experience.summary: At Minsky, my role was to build interfaces and put together the business logic for the various entities that worked with Minsky.
